title: Dave Returns From The Davidoff Advisory Board
itunes:title: Dave Returns From The Davidoff Advisory Board
description: This week we take a look inside the Davidoff Advisory Board, where our own David Garofalo was this past week in Tampa, Florida.It's been a busy couple of weeks on the show, and this week we smoke some of the newest cigars that have recently hit the shelves. Also back producing is Chuck Morrison.Join us for all the madness on The Cigar Authority﻿
